TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GlyphRun extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
type GlyphRun = class interface DUCE.IResource interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示一序列标志符号，这些标志符号来自具有一种字号和一种呈现样式的一种字体。

span.span: Represents a sequence of glyphs from a single face of a single font at a single size, and with a single rendering style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含字体详细信息，如标志符号索引和单个标志符号位置。The object includes font details such as glyph indices and individual glyph positions. 此外，对象还 包含生成运行时所依据的原始 Unicode 码位、字符到标志符号缓冲区的偏移量映射信息以及每个字符和每个标志符号的标志。In addition, The object contains the original Unicode code points the run was generated from, character to glyph buffer offset mapping information, and per-character and per-glyph flags. 元素表示 XAML 中的的输出 。The element represents the output of a in XAML. 以下标记语法用于描述 元素。The following markup syntax is used to describe the element. [!code-xaml[GlyphsOvwSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphsOvwSample1/CS/default.xaml#1)] 每个字形都定义了用于指定其与其他的对齐方式的指标 。Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other . 以下图形定义两种不同字形字符的各种排版品质。The following graphic defines the various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters. ![标志符号度量示意图](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "标志符号度量示意图")![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") 两个不同的字形字符的各种排字质量Various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float32 pixelsPerDip) cil managed

param.name: pixelsPerDip
param.span: 按“密度无关像素”单位计算的像素值，等效于比例因子。

span.span: The Pixels Per Density Independent Pixel value, which is the equivalent of the scale factor.

param.span: 例如，如果屏幕的 DPI 为 120（或 1.25，因为 120/96 = 1.25），那么“密度无关像素”值为 1.25。

span.span: For example, if the DPI of a screen is 120 (or 1.25 because 120/96 = 1.25) , 1.25 pixel per density independent pixel is drawn.

param.span: DPI 是 WPF 采用的独立于设备分辨率和 DPI 的度量单位。

span.span: DIP is the unit of measurement used by WPF to be independent of device resolution and DPIs.

summary.span: 获取或设置 值的列表，这些值表示对应于字形索引的步进宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of values that represent the advance widths corresponding to the glyph indices.

value.span: 表示步进宽度的 值列表。

span.span: A list of values that represent the advance widths.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 步进宽度列表中的每一项与属性返回的标志符号值相对应 。Each item in the list of advance widths corresponds to the glyph values returned by the property. 运行 (n>0 中的第 n 个标志符号的名义原点) 是第 n-1 个字形的名义原点加上运行步进矢量添加的第 n-1 个步进宽度。The nominal origin of the nth glyph in the run (n>0) is the nominal origin of the n-1th glyph plus the n-1th advance width added along the runs advance vector. 基本标志符号的步进宽度通常为非零，而组合字形通常具有零前进宽度。Base glyphs generally have a non-zero advance width, whereas combining glyphs generally have a zero advance width.

summary.span: 获取或设置将 中的字符映射到字形索引的 值列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of values that maps characters in the to glyph indices.

value.span: 表示映射的字形索引的 值列表。

span.span: A list of values that represent mapped glyph indices.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列表中的每个字符都有一个条目。There is one entry per character in the list. 列表中的每个值都提供由表示的第一个标志符号的偏移量（由表示 ） 。Each value in the list gives the offset of the first glyph, represented by , to the corresponding character, represented by . 如果有多个字符映射到单个标志符号，或映射到无法分解为完全映射到各个字符的标志符号组，则所有字符的项都具有相同的值：表示此组字符的第一个标志符号的偏移量。Where multiple characters map to a single glyph, or to a glyph group that cannot be broken down to map exactly to individual characters, the entries for all the characters have the same value: the offset of the first glyph that represents this group of characters. 如果列表 `null` 等于或等于 ，则假定顺序为1到1的映射。If the list is `null` or equal to , sequential 1 to 1 mapping is assumed.

summary.span: 获取或设置已优化其 的特定设备字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the specific device font for which the has been optimized.

value.span: 一个表示设备字体的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the device font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在 具有对命名设备字体的内置支持的设备上呈现时， 应使用特定于设备的机制来呈现，以便选择该字体，以及发送 Unicode 码位而不是标志符号索引。When a is rendered on a device that has built-in support for the named device font, the should be rendered using a device specific mechanism for selecting that font, and by sending Unicode code points rather than glyph indices. 当呈现到未包含对命名设备字体的内置支持的设备时， 应忽略。When rendering onto a device that does not include built-in support for the named device font, should be ignored.

span.span: Retrieves the value that represents the character hit of the caret of the .

span.span: The out parameter returns if the character hit is inside the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `distance`值表示从的前导边缘的偏移量 。The `distance` value represents the offset from the leading edge of the . 如果命中超出 ，则字符命中表示内最近的插入符号字符命中 。If the hit is outside the , the character hit represents the closest caret character hit within the . 结构表示有关字符命中的信息，该 索引位于命中的第一个字符的索引中，以及有关前导或尾部边缘的信息。The structure represents information about a character hit within a - the index of the first character that was hit as well as information about the leading or trailing edge.

summary.span: 检索 的前导边缘相对于脱字符（包含指定的字符命中）的前导边缘或尾随边缘的偏移量。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未对其 进行命中测试，则返回0.0 的距离。If the is not hit testable, the distance of 0.0 is returned. 使用 属性可确定是否 可以进行命中测试。Use the property to determine if a can be hit test.

exception.span: 字符命中在由 Unicode 字符串指定的范围外部。

span.span: The character hit is outside the range specified by the Unicode string.

summary.span: 获取或设置 值的数组，这些值表示采用呈现物理字体的标志符号索引。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of values that represent the glyph indices in the rendering physical font.

value.span: 一个 值列表，这些值表示标志符号索引。

span.span: A list of values that represent the glyph indices.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标志符号索引的默认值由字体的字符映射表为内部文本中相应的 Unicode 码位定义。The default value of the glyph indices are defined by the font's character map table for the corresponding Unicode code points in the inner text.

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::Windows::Point> ^ GlyphOffsets { System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::Windows::Point> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::Windows::Point> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 值的数组，这些值表示 中字形的偏移量。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of values representing the offsets of the glyphs in the .

value.span: 表示字形偏移量的 值列表。

span.span: A list of values representing the offsets of glyph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标志符号偏移量值将添加到名义标志符号原点以生成标志符号的最终原点。The glyph offset values are added to the nominal glyph origin to generate the final origin for the glyph. 属性表示的标称标志符号原点的值 。The property represents the values of the nominal glyph origins for the . 基本标志符号的标志符号偏移量通常为 (0，0) ，组合字形通常具有偏移量，可将它们正确放置在最近的前面的基本标志符号顶部。Base glyphs generally have a glyph offset of (0, 0), combining glyphs generally have an offset that places them correctly on top of the nearest preceding base glyph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `true` ，则使用垂直基线定位指标，构成文本字符的标志符号将按逆时针旋转90°。If is `true`, the glyphs that make up text characters are rotated 90° counter-clockwise, using vertical baseline positioning metrics.
